title: Slope Percent to Degrees
summary: Convert slope percent into degrees for layout.
whenToUse: Use when grades are given as percent but you need an angle.
howToUse: Enter slope percent to get degrees.
steps: Divide slope percent by 100 to get rise/run ratio.
Use arctan to convert to degrees.
commonMistakes: Using 12.5 as a ratio instead of percent.
siteTips: Small percentages translate into small angles.
